alert.note: Alert for Pecos; Ward (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 08 at 3:00AM CST until January 09 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. For the High Wind Warning, west winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Ward and Pecos Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 6 AM CST early this morning. For the High Wind Warning, from 6 AM this morning to midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
